description:
goplay: provide optional "simple mode"

Some browsers, like Mobile Safari, can't cope with the fancy editor
we use for doing line numbering, error highlighting, and so on.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-playground

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org, mattn.jp@gmail.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

Please replace "lame browsers" with an actual description
of the problem you are trying to fix ("browsers without JavaScript",
"IE 7", whatever).

Russ

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

PTAL

On 2012/03/15 07:08:30, adg wrote:
> Hello mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com, mailto:rsc@golang.org, mailto:mattn.jp@gmail.com (cc:
> mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5821045/diff/4005/static/style.css
File static/style.css (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5821045/diff/4005/static/style.css#newcode21
static/style.css:21: .switch {
I couldn't click 'simple mode' link without adding below here.

	position: relative;

I uses google chrome dev-channel.

On 15 March 2012 16:59,  <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:
> LGTM
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5821045/diff/4005/static/style.css
> File static/style.css (right):
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/5821045/diff/4005/static/style.css#newcode21
> static/style.css:21: .switch {
> I couldn't click 'simple mode' link without adding below here.
>
>        position: relative;
>
> I uses google chrome dev-channel.

That's odd. I use dev channel too (19.0.1068.0) and it worked fine for me.

I also uses 19.0.1068.0 on windows.

http://go-gyazo.appspot.com/c1f08201c24834f8.png 

But I can't click. :-(

> On 15 March 2012 16:59,  <mattn.jp@gmail.com> wrote:

> >
> >        position: relative;
> >
> > I uses google chrome dev-channel.

> That's odd. I use dev channel too (19.0.1068.0) and it worked fine for me.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-playground/source/detail?r=24603b81abd0 ***

goplay: provide optional "simple mode"

Some browsers, like Mobile Safari, can't cope with the fancy editor
we use for doing line numbering, error highlighting, and so on.

subject: code review 5821045: goplay: provide optional "simple mode"
